fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Optic disc cupping, visual field loss.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Topical beta-blockers, prostaglandin analogs, laser therapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular intraocular pressure monitoring, visual field testing
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Blurred vision, difficulty with bright lights.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Clouding of the lens observed on slit lamp examination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Surgical removal of the cataract, intraocular lens implant
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Drusen and pigment changes in the macula, visual acuity loss.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Microaneurysms, haemorrhages, exudates, and neovascularization on fundoscopy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Tight glucose control, regular eye exams
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Long periods of screen use, dry environments.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Discomfort in windy or air-diseaseed environments.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Reduced tear breakup time, corneal staining observed with fluorescein.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Artificial tears, punctal plugs, omega-3 supplements
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Environmental modifications, regular eye breaks during screen use
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to allergens or contagious agents.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Conjunctival redness and swelling, purulent discharge in bacterial infection.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotic eye drops for bacterial, antihistamines for allergic
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe eye pain, redness, and blurred vision; sensitivity to light.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Use of contact lenses, especially overnight wear.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Corneal opacity, stromal infiltrates, and possible ulceration.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotic or anti-fungal eye drops, corticosteroids
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid contact lens wear until resolution, regular follow-up
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Eye redness, pain, blurred vision, and floaters.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Anterior chamber cells and flare, conjunctival redness, possible posterior involvement.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Consult if pregnant (may require adjustment in therapy)
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for complications, manage underlying cause
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sudden appearance of floaters, flashes of light, and shadow or curtain over vision.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: History of eye injuries, high myopia.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Retina appears elevated with folds, loss of retinal transparency.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Laser photocoagulation, pneumatic retinopexy, scleral buckle, vitrectomy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Immediate ophthalmic evaluation, surgery to reattach retina
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Distorted or blurred central vision; a dark spot in the center of vision.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Small break in the macula noted on optical coherence tomography (OCT).
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Age-related macular degeneration, central serous retinopathy
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Vitrectomy to repair the hole, gas bubble placement
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Eyelid itching, redness, and dandruff-like scales on eyelashes.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Associated with skin disease like rosacea.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Eyelid irritation and tear film disturbance.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Eyelid margin erythema, scaling, and crusting; eyelash loss may occur.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Eyelid hygiene, warm compresses, antibiotic ointment
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Maintain eyelid cleanliness, manage underlying skin disease
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sudden vision loss in one eye, pain with eye movement.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: May be associated with multiple sclerosis.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Visual field defect, colour vision impairment.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swollen optic disc on fundoscopy, afferent pupillary defect.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Ischemic optic neuropathy, compressive optic neuropathy
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for development of multiple sclerosis, regular neuro-ophthalmologic evaluation
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Growth of pink, fleshy tissue on the conjunctiva, often associated with irritation or discomfort.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: High exposure to ultraviolet light, wind, and sand.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Visual disturbance if encroaching on the cornea.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Wing-shaped fibrovascular growth on the conjunctiva extending onto the cornea.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Lubricating eye drops, surgical removal for significant growth
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Sunglasses and hats for UV protection, monitor for growth
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe pain, redness, and blurred vision in the eye; may notice white spot on the cornea.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Opaque area on the cornea with surrounding inflammation, possible hypopyon.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antibiotic or anti-fungal eye drops, possible hospitalisation
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid contact lens wear until healed, strict hygiene
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Decreased vision in one eye not correctable by glasses or contact lenses.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Strabismus, significant refractive error in one eye.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Visual acuity discrepancy between eyes, may have strabismus or anisometropia.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Occlusion therapy of the stronger eye, corrective lenses
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up to monitor vision, early intervention is critical
fields.label: Care Plan
